LanguageData.CallShipDesc: You can call a trader ship, when Subspace Burst Transponder fully charged
LanguageData.InsufficientChargeLevel: Insufficient Charge Level to Contact Ship.
LanguageData.IncHaulPriorityDesc: Increase the hauling priority of the designated items.
LanguageData.OverHaulPriorityDesc: Increase the hauling priority of the designated items
LanguageData.NeedAqHopperDesc:
You have an aquaculture basin with no aquaculture hopper next to it.

To work, aquaculture basin must draw from an adjacent aquaculture hopper filled with raw vegetables.

Build an aquaculture hopper adjacent to the aquaculture basin.
LanguageData.IdleAqBasinDesc:
You have an idle aquaculture basin.

You should supply it some fish eggs to start breeding.

Use the bills tab to order it and check you have an available fisher.
LanguageData.FrozenFishingSpotDesc:
One of your fishing spot is frozen.

Your fishers' efficiency will be greatly reduced.

Make a hole in the ice (clear snow) so they can work.
LanguageData.BredFishedDied: Bred fishes have died in an aquaculture basin. You should check its conditions.
LanguageData.MicroFungusDesc: Some of your aquaculture basins have been infected by a strange aquatic fungus.\nIt seems to consume all the water's oxygen.\nLet's hope the fishes will survive this deprivation.
LanguageData.TreasureDesc: has found a sunken treasure while fishing! What a good catch!\n
LanguageData.DeadMarineDesc:
has cought a dead body while fishing!

'This is really disgusting but look at his gear! This guy was probably a Mining Co. security member. I wonder what happend to him...'
"
LanguageData.AqReport: Aquaculture hopper must be placed next to an aquaculture basin.
LanguageData.PlaceOnBank: Fishing pier must be placed on a bank.
LanguageData.PlaceonWater: Fishing pier must be placed on water.
LanguageData.SpotOnWater: Fishing spot must be placed on water.
LanguageData.PierToClose: An other fishing pier is too close.
LanguageData.BprintToClose: An other fishing pier blueprint is too close.
LanguageData.FrameToClose: An other fishing pier frame is too close.
